metadata.title: Too Tired
metadata.songInfo: by Jonny Lang recording of 1995 from Smokin' (Oarfin 9523) ,

xml.lyrics:
Well I laid down last night, too tired to wake I had a chill this mornin', too tired to shake I got a good poker hand, too tired to win I can hear my baby callin', too tired to let her in
Well I'm tired, yes I'm tired babe Too tired now, too tired for anything
Too tired to walk , too tired to run I can hear my baby knockin' Too tired Too tired Too tired babe, yes I'm tired Too tired now Too tired for anything Break it down now
Too tired of prosperity, too tired o' luck I'm sittin' on a pin, I'm too tired to get up Well I'm tired, yes I'm tired babe Too tired now Too tired for anything, I'm tired babe
